active_idea[THEME]: the struggles and regrets of a failing relationship
active_idea[IDEA]: the importance of communication and effort in a relationship
active_idea[TONE]: a mix of regret, hope, and fear
active_idea[ALLEGORY]: comparing the roller coaster of emotions in a relationship to an actual roller coaster
active_idea[CONTENT]: the narrator's reflections on their past mistakes and desire for a second chance
active_idea[IMAGERY]: references to the beach, stars, and moon as symbols of the couple's love and passion
active_idea[SYMBOLISM]: the new woman representing hope and a fresh start for the narrator
